title: A Sneak Peek at New Content Coming to Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition
description: Last month, we teased that not only would Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition be coming to PlayStation, but a new expansion is planned as well. To put a cherry on top, we will also be releasing one of the biggest updates Age II: DE has ever had! While we continue working on getting all … Continued

title: Dive Into the Action of Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose
description: Prepare to embark on an epic journey with Knights of Cross and Rose, the newest Age of Empires IV DLC, set to release this spring! While we’re still putting the finishing touches on this exciting release, we wanted to pull back the curtain and provide an overview of what you can expect from Knights of … Continued

title: Immortal Pillars Now Available for Age of Mythology: Retold
description: Another legendary journey begins now, in Immortal Pillars, the first expansion for Age of Mythology: Retold. Command divine powers, lead mythical creatures, and build majestic cities as you experience a rich tapestry of Chinese culture and mythology.

title: Age of Mythology: Retold Update 18.9036
description:
Welcome heroes to another exciting update, full of balance changes, minor fixes, and more! So take a peek at the notes and then jump in to the latest for Age of Mythology: Retold!

And if you didn't know already, Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition is available on PlayStation 5 right now!

title: Early Access for Age of Mythology: Retold on PlayStation 5 Starts TODAY!
description: Age of Mythology: Retold is now available on PlayStation 5! For players who have pre-ordered the Premium Edition, your legend begins now ahead of the global launch on March 4th.   We’re excited to welcome new players not just to Age of Mythology, but to the incredible community. You’re entering a world where gods, monsters, and … Continued
